'''''These Are a Few of My...''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To obtain this achievement, the player needs to turn on any of the gramophones found in underwater pavilion-like structures of [[Fontaine]].

==Gameplay Notes==
*The underwater pavilion-like structures can be spotted on the "Source of All Waters: The Great Fontaine Lake" underground map, and are found in the following locations:
** [[Elton Trench]], [[Beryl Region]]
*** [[Radiant Spincrystal 101]] can be found on the gramophone here.
** [[Salacia Plain]], [[Court of Fontaine Region]]

==Trivia==
* The name of the achievement is a reference to the song ''"My Favorite Things"'' from the musical ''{{w|The Sound of Music}}''.
